DOC.detailed_description: This single-center ( University Malaya Medical Centre ) , randomize , double-Blind , placebo-controlled versus bupropion hydrochloride sustained-releases study trial 70 men methadone emergent sexual dysfunction . Bupropion hydrochloride sustained-release ( Wellbutrin SR ) 150mg day 7 day 150mg twice day 42 day . Taken orally subjects.The total duration study expect 24 month . 20months subject recruitment 4 month final subject follow-up . The primary endpoint Mean improvement score Clinical Global Impression Scale adapt sexual Function ( CGI-SF ) . Secondary endpoint Change baseline International Index Erectile Function ( IIEF-15 ) score . Mean improvement score sexual desire inventory 2 ( SDI2 ) . Other evaluation include : Montgomery-Åsberg Depression Rating Scale ( MADRS- Malay version ) , Mini International Neuropsychiatric Interview ( M.I.N.I ) , Opiate Treatment Index ( OTI ) , World health organization Quality Life-Brief Scale ( WHOQoL-Brief , Malay version ) , Malay Version Golombok-Rust Inventory Marital State ( Mal-GRIMS ) Rapid urine drug test . Safety evaluation include : Incidence adverse event . Data analyze use linear mixed-effects model .
